"...That's strange...":
"I've released the lock, but
nothing has changed at all..."

"The central barrier won't open...
I don't understand..."

"Miss Manon... I've got a transmission
from Mr. Crawford for you."
"Crawford?"

"It appears they've finished their
analysis on the data we sent over."
"Thank you."

"We've analysed the data sent over
by the ARKS fighting in the Stia Region."

"The central stronghold...
\"Stia Central Region\", if you will."

"In order to enter it, there seems to be one more terminal
you'll have to access in order to release the lock."

"Indeed, but we're unsure as to
where it is, nor how to operate it..."
"I just so happened to ask a friend to look into it for us."
"Manon!"
"Uh, Ilma?"

"So, about the last control
terminal's location and usage..."

"I just sent some data over to your Mag!
Use it as an outline for what you'll need to do!"

"You'll have to execute the data in a certain order,
but I don't think you'll have any trouble figuring it out."

"Anyways, I'm gonna return
to my research. See you later!"

"Ilma sounded quite confident
in your abilities."

"I'd like to echo that confidence.
If anyone can do this, it's you."
"Crawford..."

"There is little doubt that Dark Falz
sleeps within Stia's central region..."

"I'm sorry for asking so much of you all. We're preparing
on our end as well. Hold out for just a bit longer."
"We've finished transporting and treating the injured. We'll be moving to Stia's central region shortly."
"Understood. We'll continue our work as well."
"Good luck."
"エアリオ遠征隊レンジャー"
"エアリオ遠征隊フォース"
"スティア先遣隊ハンター"
"スティア先遣隊ファイター"
